features.Resolution: (1920 x 1080) FHD, IPS, 350nits, Anti-glare, 45% NTSC, 144Hz, G-SYNC®
features.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2050 4GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 1575MHz, TGP 70W
features.Audio: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
features.Speakers: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Gaming Audio
features.Headset Port: 1 x Headset (headphone and microphone combo) port
features.USB Ports: 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports, 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 ports
features.USB-C Port: 1 x USB-C® 3.2 Gen 2 (support data transfer, Power Delivery 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4)
